title: Наследство
overview: 25 years ago, Victor, a millionaire and adventurer, abandoned his family in Moscow - his wife and several children - and fled to Italy, hiding from criminal prosecution. Today, his relatives live in Reutov the most ordinary modest life, going on holidays and quietly grumbling at each other. On one of these holidays, a luxury car arrives at the entrance of Tatiana, Victor's ex-wife, and in it Victor, who looks like Don Corleone, with his driver. After many years, he wanted to establish relations with his family, and at the same time solve his criminal problems once and for all by "eliminating" the right person.The family, to put it mildly, is not thrilled with Victor's sudden appearance. However, he comes up with a cunning move and promises a multimillion-dollar inheritance to the kindest, most sensitive and helpful relative. What you can't do for such a father - especially if each of the children has huge financial difficulties.
